description: This dataset is a listing of all current City of Chicago employees, complete with full names, departments, positions, and annual salaries. For hourly employees the annual salary is estimated. Data Owner: Human Resources. Frequency: Data is updated quarterly. For information on the positions and related salaries detailed in the budget as of January 1, 2013, visit the "Budget - 2013 Budget Ordinance - Positions and Salaries" dataset: https://data.cityofchicago.org/d/78az-bt2s.

name: Current Employee Names, Salaries, and Position Titles
